hero.title: About Us
hero.description: At AxolotlCode, our passion for innovation and digital development drives us to build solutions that transform ideas into technological realities.

about.title: Learn about our history
about.text-1: AxolotlCode was born with the mission of transforming our clients' ideas into high-impact technological solutions. From our beginnings, we have prioritized innovation, quality, and security in every project, working with a committed and passionate team.
about.text-2: Throughout our journey, we have helped companies from various sectors modernize their processes and achieve their objectives in an ever-evolving digital world. We take pride in being strategic allies in our clients' technological transformation.
about.alt: About Us - Get to Know Us

mision.title: Mission
mision.description: To develop innovative and customized technological solutions that optimize our clients' business processes, ensuring security, efficiency, and quality in each project, while promoting the use of modern technologies to contribute to their business success.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be leaders in software development in Mexico, recognized for the excellence and innovation of our technological solutions, establishing trusted relationships with our clients and making a significant impact on companies' digital transformation.

hero.title: Contact and Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Do you have questions or need more information about our services? Contact us or check our FAQ section. We are committed to providing clear and quick answers to ensure you have the best experience with us.

who-us.title: Who are we?
who-us.description: We are AxolotlCode, a software development and digital solutions company. Our expert team combines innovation, quality, and commitment to develop customized technological tools that adapt to your needs.

question-1.title: What type of software can you develop for my company?
question-1.description: We develop customized software solutions, including web applications, mobile apps, and enterprise systems. Our approach is based on understanding your needs and creating innovative tools that optimize your processes, improve efficiency, and increase your company's productivity.

question-2.title: How can I hire a technology consultancy with you?
question-2.description: It's very easy. Just contact us through our website or by phone, and we'll schedule a meeting to understand your goals and challenges. Our team of experts will provide strategic advice based on industry best practices to help you make sound technology decisions.

question-3.title: What are the benefits of having professionals at my disposal?
question-3.description: Having our IT professionals gives you access to highly trained experts in various technology areas without the need to hire additional staff. This reduces operating costs, streamlines processes, and ensures efficient solutions tailored to your business needs.

question-4.title: What's the difference between standard and custom software?
question-4.description: Standard software is generic and designed for a broad audience, which can create limitations in functionality. In contrast, custom software is developed specifically for your company, allowing you to automate processes, optimize resources, and ensure greater efficiency without restrictions.

question-5.title: How long does software development take?
question-5.description: Development time depends on the project's complexity and features. Before starting, we conduct a detailed analysis to estimate realistic timelines and ensure deliveries within the agreed time. We ensure quality without compromising speed.

question-6.title: Do you offer maintenance and updates for developed systems?
question-6.description: We offer continuous support to ensure optimal software performance. Our updates include security improvements, compatibility with new technologies, and performance optimization, ensuring your system is always up-to-date and protected.

question-7.title: Can I scale my software in the future as my company grows?
question-7.description: We design scalable solutions that can evolve with your company. Whether adding new features, optimizing performance, or integrating additional tools, our software adapts to your business growth without needing replacement.

question-8.title: Does the contracted software or service have a warranty?
question-8.description: We offer warranty on all our developments and services. While the software or system is under our management, we will correct any technical errors that may arise FREE OF CHARGE, as long as they are not caused by misuse by the client.

contact.title: Do you have a project in mind?
contact.description: We can help you! We cover much of Mexico City and surrounding areas.

footer.description: At AxolotlCode, we transform ideas into digital realities. We create innovative, secure, and customized applications that drive your business towards success.
